description: A slime that duplicates every 5 minutes if observed. It has been seen to understand human emotions and attempts to comfort a human feeling sad or angry.
containment: The slime is placed in a fully sealed container, with various toys and play items to keep it happy

addendums.text: "The object consistently duplicates after five minutes, but only if it's observed. Further research is required" - Dr Dover
"After an argument with management, I was pissed and came to 001 to do my job, and it seemed to recognize my emotion. It moved over to me and attempted to comfort me? Unsure." - Dr Jason
"To our knowledge, it does not die naturally. Only dies when melted or blown up. Guns and other weapons do not work, and will bounce off." - Dr Dover
